body:
Dear All,






I am new to Radiance and trying to show the effect of light  pipes in
daylight levels with ECOTECT and Radiance. I have created the building in
ECOTECT but unable to model the light pipes exactly. Is there any reference
document for the same? Or if anyone can guide me in detail how to model the
same?


Any help will be appreciated.






Many Thanks,


Bhartendu Awasthi
